column2: This is the template for creating batches of tasks (initiatives) in Commons
1. Make a copy of the "Template" sheet
2. Populate the "patientId" column with the Cityblock patientID for the members that we want to trigger this workflow for
3. Go to File -> Download -> Comma Separated Values (CSV)
4. When you're ready, upload the CSV file into the "Bulk Trigger Workflow" feature in Commons. NOTE: This takes effect immediately in Commons - measure twice, cut once :)

column3: The member's Commons patient ID (uuidv4 format)
The template slug is the specific workflow you want to kick off for the patient.
